name: SantaCorps: Snow Patrol
description:
Don the parka and shovel of the SantaCorps' Snow Patrol elf unit in this accessible arcade puzzle frenzy! 

  • Festive fever - race against the clock in 36 unique puzzles over 3 worlds in an endless flurry of fast-paced score-chasing action!
  • Suit up with friends, with up to 3 players supported locally!
  • Featuring all new music by Still Crisp!

Made in a week for our internal annual jam.  For the best experience we recommend downloading the game below for play on your device (Mac version is untested, but should work).

Merry Christmas, and happy holidays from Team V. 

-----------------

Directed and Produced by Ethan Redd

Design, code, 3D art: Ethan Redd

2D Art, 3D art: Seth Redd

OST: Still Crisp

SFX: 2 Mello

VOX: Lu Patterson
